index.title: First, select the signal frequency band...
index.description: There are a lot of signals with distinct protocols out there! This step will help us pick the right instruments for the specific signal you want to process. We also expect too add support for a lot more signals really soon.

steps.title: Where are you at?
steps.description: From the recording thru processing, the WeatherDump supports a myriad of input options. To proceed, select below where are you at in the receiving process and what kind of input file you want to process.

decoder.title: Decoding the input file...
decoder.description: In the decoding step, the data from the demodulator is synchronized and corrected using Error Correcting algorithms like Viterbi and Reed-Solomon. This step is computationally intensive and might take a while.

processor.title: Customize processor output...
processor.description: In the decoding step, the data from the demodulator is synchronized and corrected using Error Correcting algorithms like Viterbi and Reed-Solomon. This step is computationally intensive and might take a while.

showroom.title: Where are you at?
showroom.description: From the recording thru processing, the WeatherDump supports a myriad of input options. To proceed, select below where are you at in the receiving process and what kind of input file you want to process.
